channel.title: What a piece of work is a man
channel.description:
Aldous Huxley presents a lecture series in which he asks, "how did our ancestors think of human nature and in what terms ought we to think about it?"

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

image.title: What a piece of work is a man

item.title: Human potentialities, part 2
item.description: This program presents the conclusion of a lecture by Aldous Huxley entitled "Human Potentialities."
item.dc:creator: WGBH (Radio/television station : Boston, Mass.)
item.dc:subject: U.S. Literature
